name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT侧边栏-模型聚合(国内免费直连)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT侧边栏-模型聚合(国内免费直连)，是一款支持在浏览器侧边栏使用的支持ChatGPT-3.5/GPT-4o等多种模型的聊天机器人。打破国内的连接限制，支持来自全球各地的用户轻松直连使用。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notification 🔈: Support for GPT-4o-mini, GPT-4 models, and Gemini models is now available!

The ChatGPT sidebar - Model Aggregation (free direct connection in China) is a chatbot that supports various models including ChatGPT 3.5, GPT-4, Google Gemini, Claude, and more. It breaks through domestic connectivity restrictions, allowing users from around the world to easily connect and use the service.

🔍 Feature Introduction:

Multiple Models: GPT-3.5 series, GPT-4 series, Google Gemini series, Claude series, Alibaba Tongyi Qianwen, Moon's Dark Side Kimi, music model Suno, and more.
Rich Formats: Various output formats including code, markdown, charts, formulas, etc.
Abundant Prompt Templates: Beginners can quickly get started by asking questions to ChatGPT without worrying about wasting question quotas.
Cloud Storage of Chat History: Your chat history will be saved in the cloud for easy review at any time and accessible across different devices.
Sidebar Display: Displayed from the browser sidebar, it won't affect your page usage, and you can compare content on dual screens.
Breaking Domestic Restrictions: Users from all over the world can connect directly to OpenAI's official ChatGPT without the need for workarounds.
Online customer support is available. You can contact us for technical support via email at [ai@omegaxyz.cn].

💴 Package Introduction:
Built-in initial token value; if you need more tokens, you can purchase points to obtain them at a very high cost-performance ratio, with 10 points available for 1 yuan. Users do not need to make large payments for packages; points can be purchased according to personal needs and can be accumulated infinitely. Use freely.

通知🔈：现已支持GPT-4o-mini模型！GPT-4o模型！Gemini模型!
